it.polito.verifoo.rest.common

Class NodeNetworkObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<Node,it.polito.verigraph.mcnet.components.NetworkObject>
        • it.polito.verifoo.rest.common.NodeNetworkObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<Node,it.polito.verigraph.mcnet.components.NetworkObject>

    public class NodeNetworkObject
extends java.util.HashMap<Node,it.polito.verigraph.mcnet.components.NetworkObject>
    This class generates a Map of a new network object and associated node. The network object are generated inside this class by extracting from the schema the type and by processing the configuration. It also provide methods for Acl Attaching (for firewall object) and resource Attaching(for cache object)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
